pages.text: Skeleton Servants will attempt to kill anyone who hurts you or any hostile creatures nearby. They will occasionally shoot Weakness Arrows if summoned when the Summoner wears both a Necro Helm and Robe.
Attempting to summon a Skeleton Servant in a cold tundra exposed to the skies will yield a Stray Servant instead.
Casting the spell at a Pillager Outpost will summon forth a loyal Skeleton Pillager, which has more health than regular Skeletons and wields a crossbow.
Skeleton Servants can accept any Armor but only Swords/Bows meaning they can either be range or melee attackers.

Curiously, the spell cannot call forth a loyal Wither Skeleton when cast within a Nether Fortress. The charred skeletons seems to hold great magical power and a great loyalty towards their home to be summoned frivolously...
